## Source: ossf-package-analysis (a3571367d4274d4ca5d5c2cd7b400c40b4d656c2c58fb0746e8372cb24910c5b)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'actions-experiment' @ 95.95.95 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
